title: @Meddler How about that creep block?
body:
So yeah, it's no secret creep block is annoying as hell. Just wondering if you guys have any plans at all for addressing this? Also, is there a reason why it seems unfathomably more potent now than it did in season 5? It's gotten so bad that the two kruggs will box you into the wall until they're killed or you can use an escape to get out. 

If you enjoy creep block in the game, can you at least make it so you can only be blocked by enemy creeps?

replies.body: Minion/monster blocking's had some issues we've wanted to improve for a long time. In 5.22 we released changes that addressed one of the major issues, that revealed some other problems however that are pretty frustrating. In 5.24 we're going to roll back the changes to the pre 5.22 system so that things are in a better spot while we work on a good long term solution to multiple problems.
I don't think this is a problem exclusive to minion blocking. Pathing has been an issue for as long as I can remember.
Awesome man! Always quick with the responses. Good to know I soon won't be getting caught on Kruggs with J4 anymore.
To be fair, I'm pretty sure that the fact that they were going to be rolling Creep Block back to pre 5.22 until it's more hammered out has been public info for at least a few days now.
Minion block op! I can't recall how many times a minion block that delayed my travel time by 0.25 - 1 sec totally screwed me over in combat.

Last I heard (from someone) they were looking to revert it because the new version wasn't working.  That's good because the previous version worked well.

>If you enjoy creep block in the game, can you at least make it so you can only be blocked by enemy creeps?

No, we can't.
It's when a minion, usually a large group of them, blocks your pathing and makes you go a route you normally wouldn't. Also happens with jungle monsters, specifically the kruggs.
